name: AdandCrapBlock
tagline: This tool downloads the AdAway  host-files and merge it into the file /etc/hosts
body:
AdAndCrapBlock ============== This tool downloads the AdAway host-files and merge it into the file /etc/hosts

Arch Linux

$ yaourt -S adandcrapblock
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
